name: 嚴建隆
objective:
電腦輔助設計指利用電腦及其圖形設備幫助設計人員進行設計工作。(1) 機械設計概論，(2) 機械製圖標準，(3) 二維設計繪圖、零件圖、裝配圖，(4) 三維設計繪圖、立體圖。
Computer-aided design refers to the use of computers and graphics equipment to help designers in their design work. (1) Introduction to mechanical design, (2) Mechanical drawing standards, (3) Two-dimensional design drawings, parts drawings, assembly drawings, (4) Three-dimensional design drawing, stereogram.
schedule:
AutoCAD2020、SolidWorks2022

第 5 週：(第 5 章) 基本繪圖
第 6 週：(第 5 章) 二維設計繪圖、零件圖
